title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On the Project Properties Info page, certain fields are displayed as text fields instead of labels.
EB: These fields should be displayed as labels instead of text fields.
SR: To reproduce the issue, navigate to the Project Properties Info page and observe that certain fields are displayed as text fields instead of labels.
